response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This extraordinary item holds immense value to us, as it represents years of innovation and dedication to excellence. We are extending an exclusive opportunity for you to own this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $850,000. This offer is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and appreciation for quality. Please let us know if you would like to explore this opportunity further.", "product_price": 850000}
